title: Conservatives get schooled by Noam Chomsky
description:
Blog post link: http://www.year501.org/conservatives-get-schooled/  I didn't quite have time to write it up properly - all the links are there, it just sounds as if I wrote it while half-asleep :) I'll fix it as soon as possible.

The three clips in the video are from interviews/debates as stated in the video. You can find the Andrew Marr and Evan Solomon interviews here on Youtube, I'll also add the links here. The full Bolkestein debate should be coming soon, if not to this channel then somewhere else.
